title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 603.6 - Participation by municipalities with approved LWRPs or LWRPs near approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 603.6 - Participation by municipalities with approved LWRPs or LWRPs near approval

State Regulations
(a) Cities, towns
or villages with approved LWRPs on the effective date of this Part may develop
and submit an HMP for review and approval. However, any city, town or village
which seeks to amend an approved LWRP must include a HMP for approval in any
such amendment. This requirement may be waived by the secretary to the extent
commensurate with the particular circumstances of the local government
proposing the LWRP amendment. (b) Cities, towns or villages which have completed the review period provided in
section
601.4
(b) of this

Title before July 1, 1994 shall not be required to submit an HMP as a
precondition to approval of an LWRP. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
603.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
